descriptions.400: Your request is malformed, like a broken ocarina. Check your inputs and try playing the song again.
descriptions.401: This door is locked. You need the proper key or medallion to pass through these gates.
descriptions.402: You need more Rupees to access this content. Visit the shop or find hidden treasures.
descriptions.403: This path is sealed by ancient magic. You lack the power to break this barrier, brave hero.
descriptions.404: The path you seek has been lost to time. Play the Song of Time to find another way, brave traveler.
descriptions.405: That action won't work here. Try a different tool from your inventory, hero.
descriptions.406: This format is incompatible with your quest. Seek another form of passage.
descriptions.408: Time has run out! The timer expired before you could complete this task. Try again swiftly.
descriptions.409: A timeline conflict has occurred. Multiple versions of this resource exist. Resolve the paradox.
descriptions.410: This content has been erased from time itself. Not even the Master Sword can restore it.
descriptions.413: Your bag is too full! This payload is heavier than a Goron. Lighten your load and try again.
descriptions.429: You're exhausted from too many attempts. Rest and regain your stamina before trying again.
descriptions.500: Dark magic has corrupted the server. Our sages are working to restore the balance.
descriptions.502: The bridge between realms is broken. The gateway cannot be crossed at this time.
descriptions.503: The temple is closed for maintenance. Return when the sun rises again, hero.
descriptions.504: The portal timed out before completing the connection. Try opening it again.
descriptions.default: The path you seek has been lost to time. Play the Song of Time to find another way, brave traveler.

footers.404: May the Goddess smile upon you
footers.default: May the Goddess smile upon you
